tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to uncaught exceptions due to concurrent map write panics in the `cachingMapper` class when performing bulk conversions. This can lead to unexpected crashes and instability in applications relying on concurrent data processing..
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@pulumi/pulumi` library to the patch version.
